content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal experience, but based on research, the National Film Board of Canada provides ongoing support to filmmakers after their project is completed. This includes distribution through various channels such as festivals, television broadcasts and online platforms, as well as marketing and promotion of the film. The NFB also offers post-production services, such as sound mixing and color correction, to ensure the film meets industry standards. Filmmakers may also receive funding for their next project through the NFB's various funding programs. The NFB also facilitates networking opportunities and mentorship for emerging filmmakers.
